select t.textbook_name, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '0' then 1 else 0 end) as dp0, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as dp1, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as dp2, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as dp3, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as decid1, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as decid2, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as decid3 from textbook t LEFT JOIN dec_position dp ON t.id=dp.textbook_id
1=1
and t.material_id = ${material_id}
GROUP BY t.id HAVING (decid1>=1 or decid2>=1 or decid3>=1) limit 0,9

select t.textbook_name, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as dp1, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as dp2, sum(case dp.chosen_position when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as dp3, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as decid1, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as decid2, sum(case dp.declaration_id when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as decid3 from textbook t LEFT JOIN dec_position dp ON t.id=dp.textbook_id
1=1
and t.material_id = ${material_id}
GROUP BY t.id

Select b.id, b.textbook_name, GROUP_CONCAT(p.rank,'',(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '1' THEN d.realname END )) AS zb, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '2' THEN d.realname END ) AS fb, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '3' THEN d.realname END ) AS bw From dec_position p left join declaration d on d.id = p.declaration_id left join textbook b on p.textbook_id = b.id
1=1
and b.material_id = ${material_id}
GROUP BY b.id HAVING (zb>=1 or fb>=1 or bw>=1)

Select b.id, b.textbook_name, GROUP_CONCAT(p.rank,'',(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '1' THEN d.realname END )) AS zb, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '2' THEN d.realname END ) AS fb, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE p.chosen_position WHEN '3' THEN d.realname END ) AS bw From dec_position p left join declaration d on d.id = p.declaration_id left join textbook b on p.textbook_id = b.id
1=1
and b.material_id = ${material_id}
GROUP BY b.id
